StatDef.label: food need decay
StatDef.description: The rate of which food need will decay. For reference: x50 will decay at half the vanilla rate.

StatDef.label: rest need decay
StatDef.description: The rate of which rest need will decay. For reference: x50 will decay at half the vanilla rate.

StatDef.label: recreation need decay
StatDef.description: The rate of which recreation need will decay. For reference: x50 will decay at half the vanilla rate.
